alert.note: Alert for Northern Fauquier; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 22 at 2:55PM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northern Maryland and northern Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 PM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Wind Chill Advisory, the highest wind speeds will be Friday into Friday evening. Affects from the extreme cold could be made worse due to power outages.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
